archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: 3M Self service book return
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
3M™ Intelligent Return and Sorter System is designed for libraries interested in automating their check-in and sorting process. Your customers can quickly self return items with “real-time check-in”.
http://solutions.3m.co.uk/3MContentRetrievalAPI/BlobServlet?lmd=1408614252000&locale=en_WW&assetType=MMM_Image&assetId=1361812984387&blobAttribute=ImageFile
